meaning list.sentence translation: कम्पनीले घोटाला ढाक्न खोजेको छ ।

meaning list.sentence: When they throw a party, they go the whole nine yards with decorations and food.
meaning list.sentence translation: जब तिनीहरू पार्टी गर्छन्, तिनीहरू सजावट र खानाको साथ बाहिर जान्छन्।

meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!

meaning list.meaning: अन्तिममा आउने व्यक्तिलाई दिइएको पुरस्कार वा उपाधि (मुहावरा)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: उनीहरूले लिगको अन्तिममा भएकोमा काठको चम्चा अवार्ड पाए।

meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: यो नयाँ सफाई उत्पादन पूर्ण रूपमा काम गर्दछ।

meaning list.meaning: म कहिल्यै गर्दिन वा परिस्थितिमा हुनेछु (मुहावरा)
meaning list.sentence: I wouldn’t be caught dead wearing that outfit.
meaning list.sentence translation: म त्यो पोशाक कहिल्यै लगाउने छैन।

meaning list.sentence: They visit the same beach year in, year out.
meaning list.sentence translation: तिनीहरू प्रत्येक वर्ष एउटै समुद्र तट भ्रमण गर्छन्।

meaning list.sentence: He’s too yellow-bellied to confront his boss.
meaning list.sentence translation: उहाँ आफ्नो मालिकको सामना गर्न धेरै कायर हुनुहुन्छ।

word: you can't teach an old dog new tricks

phonetic british: juː kɑːnt tiːʧ ən əʊld dɒɡ njuː trɪks

meaning list.meaning: पुरानो बानी भएको व्यक्तिलाई बदल्न गाह्रो छ (मुहावरा)
meaning list.sentence: He refuses to learn how to use a smartphone; you can’t teach an old dog new tricks.

word: your guess is as good as mine

phonetic british: jɔːr gɛs ɪz æz ɡʊd æz maɪn

meaning list.meaning: मलाई पनि थाहा छैन, हाम्रा दुबै अनुमानहरू समान रूपमा सही हुन सक्छन् (मुहावरा)
meaning list.sentence: Why the train is late? Your guess is as good as mine.
meaning list.sentence translation: रेल किन ढिलो भयो ? मलाई पनि थाहा छैन।
